Please be aware                                                                                                                                         that weekends are not business days. All express methods of shipment still may require 1 day of processing time. "Free Shipping" applies to orders shipped within the continental                                                                                                                                         US. Domestic orders ship FedEx, UPS, and USPS. Our packages are insured and may require a signature. We cannot change your address                                                                                                                                         before the order ships. Please do not submit handling instructions in the notes                                                                                                                                         of your order requesting special handling, a specific courier or a change of address,                                                                                                                                         as we will be unable to meet these requests. Returned packages without proper RMA demarcations will be refused by our warehouse                                                                                                                                             and returned to you. Defective products are eligible for exchange,                                                                                                                                             and no restock fee will apply. All returns must be packed with all contents which came with the original package                                                                                                                                             including, cables, software, plastic and cardboard packaging, and unregistered warranty                                                                                                                                             card. This return policy excludes Televisions and Home Theater Projectors. For further                                                                                                                                             questions please call us toll free at 866-673-7187 . You can also                                                                                                                                             contact us using the contact form found here .
